//
// Change App.Config connection strings to point to the appropriate database


// If the CourseModel.edmx is updated from the database, the following may be deleted
// EF does not currently support Table-Valued Functions from SQL Server in auto-import mode
// This is a manual override of the .edmx to retrieve the function and make it available
// Add the following code in the SSDL element under the SCHEMA element
//
// http://blog.ondrejsv.com/post/Using-table-valued-database-functions-with-Entity-Framework-40.aspx
//
<Function Name="ufn_getActiveYearQuarters" IsComposable="false">
    <CommandText>
            SELECT YearQuarterID
            FROM dbo.ufn_getActiveYearQuarters()
    </CommandText>
</Function>
